706235f-a.text:
Pennsylvania Ave., from Fulton Street to Jamaica Ave., showing in the background the hotel of L. Breitkopf in 1912.  This hotel stands on the site of the New Lots Hook and Ladder Co. quarters in 1873.  The view is northward.

April 1929.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706235f-a.folder: Pennsylvania Avenue & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY
